verses.verse: Arise<WH6965>, shine<WH215>; for thy light<WH216> is come<WH935>, and the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> is risen<WH2224> upon thee.

For, behold, the darkness<WH2822> shall cover<WH3680> the earth<WH776>, and gross darkness<WH6205> the people<WH3816>: but the LORD<WH3068> shall arise<WH2224> upon thee, and his glory<WH3519> shall be seen<WH7200> upon thee.
And the Gentiles<WH1471> shall come<WH1980> to thy light<WH216>, and kings<WH4428> to the brightness<WH5051> of thy rising<WH2225>.

Lift up<WH5375> thine eyes<WH5869> round about<WH5439>, and see<WH7200>: all they gather themselves together<WH6908>, they come<WH935> to thee: thy sons<WH1121> shall come<WH935> from far<WH7350>, and thy daughters<WH1323> shall be nursed<WH539> at thy side<WH6654>.

Then thou shalt see<WH7200><WH3372>, and flow together<WH5102>, and thine heart<WH3824> shall fear<WH6342>, and be enlarged<WH7337>; because the abundance<WH1995> of the sea<WH3220> shall be converted<WH2015> unto thee, the forces<WH2428> of the Gentiles<WH1471> shall come<WH935> unto thee.

The multitude<WH8229> of camels<WH1581> shall cover<WH3680> thee, the dromedaries<WH1070> of Midian<WH4080> and Ephah<WH5891>; all they from Sheba<WH7614> shall come<WH935>: they shall bring<WH5375> gold<WH2091> and incense<WH3828>; and they shall shew forth<WH1319> the praises<WH8416> of the LORD<WH3068>.

All the flocks<WH6629> of Kedar<WH6938> shall be gathered together<WH6908> unto thee, the rams<WH352> of Nebaioth<WH5032> shall minister<WH8334> unto thee: they shall come up<WH5927> with acceptance<WH7522> on mine altar<WH4196>, and I will glorify<WH6286> the house<WH1004> of my glory<WH8597>.
Who are these that fly<WH5774> as a cloud<WH5645>, and as the doves<WH3123> to their windows<WH699>?

Surely the isles<WH339> shall wait<WH6960> for me, and the ships<WH591> of Tarshish<WH8659> first<WH7223>, to bring<WH935> thy sons<WH1121> from far<WH7350>, their silver<WH3701> and their gold<WH2091> with them, unto the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, and to the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478>, because he hath glorified<WH6286> thee.

And the sons<WH1121> of strangers<WH5236> shall build up<WH1129> thy walls<WH2346>, and their kings<WH4428> shall minister<WH8334> unto thee: for in my wrath<WH7110> I smote<WH5221> thee, but in my favour<WH7522> have I had mercy<WH7355> on thee.

Therefore thy gates<WH8179> shall be open<WH6605> continually<WH8548>; they shall not be shut<WH5462> day<WH3119> nor night<WH3915>; that men may bring<WH935> unto thee the forces<WH2428> of the Gentiles<WH1471>, and that their kings<WH4428> may be brought<WH5090>.
For the nation<WH1471> and kingdom<WH4467> that will not serve<WH5647> thee shall perish<WH6>; yea, those nations<WH1471> shall be utterly<WH2717> wasted<WH2717>.

The glory<WH3519> of Lebanon<WH3844> shall come<WH935> unto thee, the fir tree<WH1265>, the pine tree<WH8410>, and the box<WH8391> together<WH3162>, to beautify<WH6286> the place<WH4725> of my sanctuary<WH4720>; and I will make the place<WH4725> of my feet<WH7272> glorious<WH3513>.

The sons<WH1121> also of them that afflicted<WH6031> thee shall come<WH1980> bending<WH7817> unto thee; and all they that despised<WH5006> thee shall bow themselves down<WH7812> at the soles<WH3709> of thy feet<WH7272>; and they shall call<WH7121> thee, The city<WH5892> of the LORD<WH3068>, The Zion<WH6726> of the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478>.

Whereas<WH8478> thou hast been forsaken<WH5800> and hated<WH8130>, so that no man went through<WH5674> thee, I will make<WH7760> thee an eternal<WH5769> excellency<WH1347>, a joy<WH4885> of many<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.

Thou shalt also suck<WH3243> the milk<WH2461> of the Gentiles<WH1471>, and shalt suck<WH3243> the breast<WH7699> of kings<WH4428>: and thou shalt know<WH3045> that I the LORD<WH3068> am thy Saviour<WH3467> and thy Redeemer<WH1350>, the mighty One<WH46> of Jacob<WH3290>.

For brass<WH5178> I will bring<WH935> gold<WH2091>, and for iron<WH1270> I will bring<WH935> silver<WH3701>, and for wood<WH6086> brass<WH5178>, and for stones<WH68> iron<WH1270>: I will also make<WH7760> thy officers<WH6486> peace<WH7965>, and thine exactors<WH5065> righteousness<WH6666>.

Violence<WH2555> shall no more be heard<WH8085> in thy land<WH776>, wasting<WH7701> nor destruction<WH7667> within thy borders<WH1366>; but thou shalt call<WH7121> thy walls<WH2346> Salvation<WH3444>, and thy gates<WH8179> Praise<WH8416>.

The sun<WH8121> shall be no more thy light<WH216> by day<WH3119>; neither for brightness<WH5051> shall the moon<WH3394> give light<WH216> unto thee: but the LORD<WH3068> shall be unto thee an everlasting<WH5769> light<WH215>, and thy God<WH430> thy glory<WH8597>.

Thy sun<WH8121> shall no more go down<WH935>; neither shall thy moon<WH3391> withdraw<WH622> itself: for the LORD<WH3068> shall be thine everlasting<WH5769> light<WH216>, and the days<WH3117> of thy mourning<WH60> shall be ended<WH7999>.

Thy people<WH5971> also shall be all righteous<WH6662>: they shall inherit<WH3423> the land<WH776> for ever<WH5769>, the branch<WH5342> of my planting<WH4302>, the work<WH4639> of my hands<WH3027>, that I may be glorified<WH6286>.
A little one<WH6996> shall become a thousand<WH505>, and a small one<WH6810> a strong<WH6099> nation<WH1471>: I the LORD<WH3068> will hasten<WH2363> it in his time<WH6256>.
